title: Dashlane: Pricing, features, and how to get started
description: Are you looking for a reliable password manager? Dashlane secures your files using NSA-level tools. Here's how much it costs, what you get for the price, and how to get started.

title: ChatGPT's next major upgrade could let you generate video from text
description: As if ChatGPT's abilities weren't already advanced, it's going to become even more capable soon.

title: Meta is developing a decentralized Twitter alternative
description: Meta, the parent company of Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp, is working on a decentralized social media project that can rival Twitter in ways that Mastodon couldn't.

title: Apple unveiled its classical music app. Here's a sneak peek
description: Apple's new standalone classical music app is available for pre-order now.

title: How to preorder the yellow iPhone 14: First look at the new color
description: Apple's latest color option for the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Plus is available for preorder today. Here's how it looks in real life and how you can buy one.

title: Still waiting for Bing Chat access? Make sure you do these 4 things
description: Microsoft says its AI chatbot is 'more powerful than ChatGPT.' Here is how you can try it out for yourself.

title: CISA: Do these three things to toughen up your network against hackers
description: Cybersecurity agency shares the lessons learned from a red team assessment of a critical infrastructure organization.

title: US Chamber of Commerce pushes for AI regulation, warns it can disrupt economy
description: Generative AI, like ChatGPT, is an innovative and massively disruptive technology. Here's why US regulators are pushing for increased laws and provisions to ensure consumer, economic, and international safety.

title: More AI experiences are coming to Discord, including ChatGPT
description: The social platform is leaning into AI and adding new features to optimize user experience. Here's what you can expect.

title: Spotify unveils new features, including your own AI DJ. Here's how to access it
description: As Spotify continues to break the music streaming platform mold, it unveils a DJ powered by AI and a social media-like home screen.

title: Spotify's newest features include an AI DJ and vertical video content
description: As Spotify continues to break the music streaming platform mold, it unveils a DJ powered by AI and a social media-like home screen.

title: How does ChatGPT work?
description: We take a deep dive into the inner workings of the wildly popular AI chatbot, ChatGPT. If you want to know how its generative AI magic happens, read on.
